name: .JPG_MEDIUM File Extension
summary: Learn about .JPG_MEDIUM files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Image viewers and web browsers that support JPEG images, such as Adobe Photoshop (cross-platform) and Google Chrome (cross-platform), will also open JPG_MEDIUM files. However, some of these applications may not recognize the .jpg_medium extension.

If your application supports JPEG images but won't open a JPG_MEDIUM file, change the file extension to .jpg and open it with the application. Changing the file's extension will not alter its contents.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
